title: Mark Dennison
text: My first shop with Bundle Stars as smooth as I could've hoped for. The Bundle I purchased was the Broken Sword Complete Collection, which at Â£3.97 was an incredible deal. Payment went smoothly and I had instant access to the codes. Couldn't be happier. Many thanks.
